name: lastfm_search
description: Search Last.fm. Returns matching artists and tracks.

steps.code: const artists = []; document.querySelectorAll('.grid-items-item-details').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 10) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.grid-items-item-main-text a.link-block-target'); const auxEl = el.querySelector('.grid-items-item-aux-text'); artists.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', listeners: auxEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const tracks = []; document.querySelectorAll('.chartlist-row').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 10) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-name a.link-block-target'); const artistEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-artist a'); const countEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-count-bar-value'); tracks.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', artist: artistEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', plays: countEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', artist_count: artists.length, artists, track_count: tracks.length, tracks };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
